General_Description: '''Burn the Black Flag''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Piracy|Raider]] [[ship]]s pose a threat to allied [[boat]]s."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and sank a number of pirate ships throughout [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Safeguarding Trade Routes]] and [[Watered Down]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
